string.text: Enable persistent weather system. Weather will be saved and restored when loading saves.
Chance (0-100%) to keep the same weather when traveling to a new location. At 0% weather always changes on level transition (vanilla behavior). At 100% weather always persists.
Minimum in-game time (in minutes) that must pass before weather can change on level transition. If you travel between levels faster than this, weather always persists. Set to 0 to disable.
How long (in real minutes) you can stay underground before weather is allowed to change. Default: 10 minutes.

Take over rain sound from the engine completely. Requires replacing vanilla rain.ogg with silent file (optional during installation). Fixes rain sound issues after save/load. When disabled, fallback mode is used instead (only activates when engine sound fails).
Print debug messages to console. Useful for troubleshooting issues.
